mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_AIR(g_NO,g_AIRLINENM,g_DEPAIRPORTNM, g_depPlandTime,g_ARRAIRPORTNM,g_arrPlandTime,g_ECONOMYCHARGE,g_VIHICLEID,g_RDATE,g_NICK) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(g_No),0)+1 FROM G_AIR),#{airlineNm},#{depAirportNm},#{depPlandTime},#{arrAirportNm},#{arrPlandTime},#{economyCharge},#{vihicleId},SYSDATE,#{nick})

INSERT INTO B_AIR(b_NO, b_AIRLINENM, b_DEPAIRPORTNM, b_depPlandTime, b_ARRAIRPORTNM, b_arrPlandTime, b_ECONOMYCHARGE, b_VIHICLEID, b_RDATE, b_NICK) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(b_No),0)+1 FROM B_AIR),#{airlineNm},#{depAirportNm},#{depPlandTime},#{arrAirportNm},#{arrPlandTime},#{economyCharge},#{vihicleId},SYSDATE,#{nick})
mapper.select: SELECT G_No AS no, G_AIRLINENM AS airlineNm, G_DEPAIRPORTNM AS depAirportNm, g_depPlandTime as depPlandTime, G_ARRAIRPORTNM AS arrAirportNm, g_arrPlandTime as arrPlandTime, G_ECONOMYCHARGE AS economyCharge, G_VIHICLEID AS vihicleId, G_CAL as cal FROM G_AIR where g_nick=#{nick}

SELECT b_No AS no, b_AIRLINENM AS airlineNm, b_DEPAIRPORTNM AS depAirportNm, b_depPlandTime as depPlandTime, b_ARRAIRPORTNM AS arrAirportNm, b_arrPlandTime as arrPlandTime, b_ECONOMYCHARGE AS economyCharge, b_VIHICLEID AS vihicleId, b_CAL as cal FROM b_AIR where b_nick=#{nick}
mapper.update: UPDATE G_AIR SET G_CAL=2 WHERE G_NO = #{no}
UPDATE B_AIR SET B_CAL=2 WHERE B_NO = #{no}
